item.title: Is their a easier way to do this?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

Hi, I added this command:

if (command.startsWith("food")) if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot get food in the wilderness"); } else { addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); }

is their a easy way to do it, like get it to say if not in nonwild, instead of me having to do coords.

Read full topic
